g.text: starts the process of submitting a report to the NHS
asks to select the data the administrator
wants to send to the NHS(days, weeks)
requests the number of historical points
defines the number of historical points
requests the dates interval to fit the regression model
shows the available regression models and asks to select one
shows the available independent variables and asks to select one
requests the selection of the parameter for the hypothesis test
shows all data and requests for confirmation
